switch.title: Switch
switch.subtitle: Toggle component for enabling/disabling options with loading state, validation and customization support

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Standard switch in basic state without label

withLabel.title: With Label
withLabel.description: Switch with text label displayed next to the element. Label is set via `label` property

filled.title: Filled Style
filled.description: Switch with filled background instead of standard outline. Set via `variant="filled"` property

size.title: Size
size.description: Switch size is controlled by `size` property. Available values: `sm` (small), `lg` (large). Default is medium size

disabled.title: Disabled State
disabled.description: Switch in inactive state, unavailable for interaction. Set via `disabled` property. Can be either on or off

invalid.title: Error State
invalid.description: Switch in error state with red border. Activated via `invalid` property. Used to display validation errors in forms

loading.title: Loading State
loading.description: Switch in loading state with indicator. Activated via `loading` property. Blocks interaction during loading

customLabel.title: Custom Label
customLabel.description: Switch with custom label content via `default` slot. Allows using HTML markup, icons or other components instead of plain text. Slot receives `checked` parameter for conditional display

template.title: Custom Thumb
template.description: Switch with custom content inside the switch (thumb) via `thumb` slot. Allows customizing icon or content inside the switch. Slot receives `checked` parameter for conditional display

customValues.title: Custom Values
customValues.description: Switch with custom values instead of standard `true`/`false`. Configured via `trueValue` and `falseValue` properties. Useful for working with APIs that use other data types

form.title: In Form
form.description: Integration with `CFormItem`: switch validation, error message display

argTypes.modelValue: Switch value (true/false or custom value via trueValue/falseValue)
argTypes.disabled: Disables switch, making it unavailable for interaction
argTypes.loading: Shows loading indicator and blocks interaction
argTypes.label: Text label displayed next to switch
argTypes.variant: Switch style variant: outlined (with border) or filled (filled)
argTypes.trueValue: Custom value to be used when switch is on
argTypes.falseValue: Custom value to be used when switch is off
argTypes.name: Name attribute for input element (used for grouping in forms)
argTypes.id: Unique element identifier (generated automatically if not specified)
argTypes.ariaLabel: ARIA label for accessibility (alternative to label for screen readers)
argTypes.ariaLabelledby: ID of element that serves as label for switch (ARIA)
argTypes.change: Event fired when switch state changes
argTypes.focus: Event fired when switch receives focus
argTypes.blur: Event fired when switch loses focus
argTypes.thumb: Slot for custom content inside switch (thumb)
